text: "Really bizarre that somebody had the guts to make Reese Witherspoon appear to have a third leg and Oprah have a third hand... Whoever did this deserves to be in a lot of trouble!" one user said seeming to be serious.
title: SEE IT: Reese Witherspoon and Oprah appear to have extra limbs thanks to Vanity Fair Photoshop fail

meta_data.description: Give a hand — or three — for Vanity Fair's February cover stars.
